nodes.text: Grimyk was a Wookiee male Captain living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was on Cademimu V during the Cademimu uprising by the governor Chornarov. A strike team sent to take control of the Cademimu missile batteries from Chornarov engaged Grimyk and killed him.
Captain Grimyk appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a boss during the "Cademimu" flashpoint.
